Now, after regaining his impressive form from the 2022-23 season at Galatasaray, he’s expected to attract even more interest from top clubs next year. arts.ttl: Luis Enrique Reacts Bluntly to €30M-Rated Arsenal, Newcastle Target Missing From PSG Squad
arts.sum: With the January transfer window approaching, speculation about Randal Kolo Muani’s future at Paris Saint-Germain is gaining momentum, fueled by his limited playing time this season. arts.sum: Former Paris Saint-Germain star Neymar Jr. reflected on his time in the French capital during an interview on Bartoli Time with RMC this Sunday. In the discussion, Neymar revisited the circumstances of his departure from PSG a year and a half ago. arts.ttl: PSG’s €20M-Rated Ace Hints at Long Term West Ham Stay After Loan Ends
arts.sum: Carlos Soler, currently on loan from Paris Saint-Germain to West Ham United, likely realized he needed a fresh start this summer to secure regular playing time. Watching Spain win the UEFA Euro 2024 title may have further motivated him to get back on La Roja’s radar. arts.ttl: Referee briefly stops French league match between PSG and Lyon after homophobic chants
arts.sum: Earlier this month, a French campaign group renewed calls for authorities to take action against homophobic chanting by soccer fans, saying Marseille supporters belted out anti-gay slurs “with complete impunity” during a home game against Monaco. Homophobic insults often heard at Ligue 1 matches have been tolerated for a long time by club officials, and soccer authorities have struggled to find appropriate ways of tackling the issue.

arts.ttl: Rúben Amorim Explains Decision for Leaving £40M PSG-Linked Ace at Home vs. Man City

arts.ttl: Man Utd keen on PSG's Kolo Muani - Monday's gossip
arts.sum: Manchester United keen on PSG forward Randal Kolo Muani, Newcastle United looking at move for Barcelona defender Andreas Christensen, Leicester City plan Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall return, plus more.

arts.ttl: PSG extend lead at the top with win over Lyon
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain claimed a 3-1 home win over Lyon with early goals from Ousmane Dembélé and Vitinha plus a late strike from Gonçalo Ramos on Sunday.
